resources.string: Unlocks the ability to purchase your first house.
Unlocks the ability to purchase your second house.
Unlocks the ability to purchase your third house.
Unlocks the ability to duel other players.
Unlocks the ability to participate in invasions.
Unlocks the ability to participate in Outpost Rush.

Unlocks "Forge the Staff" quest which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 1 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 25 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "Heart and Souls" quest which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 2 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 35 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "The Alliance" quest which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 3 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 45 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "Race for the Box" quest which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 4 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 55 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks "The Tempest's Heart" quest which grants an Azoth Staff Tier 5 (upon completion). An Azoth staff is used to close Level 60 and 65 Corruption Breaches.\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding Main Story quests before undertaking this quest.

Unlocks the starting survivalist quest which gives you the ability to build Tier 1 camps (upon completion).\n\nNote: You must complete the preceding starting settlement and beach quests before undertaking this quest.
Unlocks "Survivalist: Friends in Fashion" quest which upgrades the camps you can build by one tier (upon completion).
Unlocks "Animal Instincts" quest which upgrades the camps you can build by one tier (upon completion).
Unlocks "Survivalist: Lupine Observations" quest which upgrades the camps you can build by one tier (upon completion).
Unlocks "Survivalist: Fading Lights" quest which upgrades the camps you can build by one tier (upon completion).
